thread.title: ECG restore power to Accra Sports Stadium after two months in darkness
thread.title_full: ECG restore power to Accra Sports Stadium after two months in darkness

title: ECG restore power to Accra Sports Stadium after two months in darkness
text:
10:40 CET ECG restore power to Accra Sports Stadium after two months in darkness - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Power has been restored to the Accra Sports Stadium after the National Sports Authority (NSA) made a first tranche payment of GH?60,000 of a GH?240,000 debt owed the Electricity Company of Ghana (ECG). 
There was great excitement amongst the staff of the NSA at the stadium on Tuesday when the lights came back on having been disconnected for almost two months. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com Sports News Follow Us WOMEN!,nothing is impossible for a woman so long as men continue using their best part to think. By: Francis Tawiah --
